rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var $ = lib.c.$\u000avar file = vars.$L_file\u000areturnCode = 0;\u000avar dppath, doppath;\u000aif (system.functions.exists(\"isDuplicate.Problem\", file) && system.functions.exists(\"hasDuplicate.Problems\", file)) {\u000a dppath = $(\"#problemService\").isDuplicateProblem(file, file, file.id);\u000a doppath = $(\"#problemService\").isDuplicateofProblem(file, file);\u000a if (dppath != null) {\u000a returnCode = 1;\u000a message = system.functions.scmsg(35, \"pm\", [dppath]);\u000a } else if (doppath != null) {\u000a returnCode = 1;\u000a message = system.functions.scmsg(351, \"pm\", [doppath]);\u000a }\u000a}"}
